# PCA Individual Plots

```{r}
pathlist =  vector()
for (x in 1:(PCA_dim -1)){
  y = x+1
  pathName_nofilter <- paste0(folder_nofilter,'PCA/PCA',x,'_',y,'.png')
  pathName_filter <- paste0(folder_filter,'PCA/PCA',x,'_',y,'.png')

  p1 <- ggdraw() + draw_image(pathName_nofilter, scale = 1)
  p2 <- ggdraw() + draw_image(pathName_filter, scale = 1)
  print(plot_grid(p1, p2))
}

```

# Cluster with Umap

```{r}
resolution_val<- sampleParam$resolution_val[sampleParam['Sample'] == sample_name]
print(paste0('Resolution: ',resolution_val))

pathName1_nofilter <- paste0(folder_nofilter,paste0('Cluster/ClusterUmap',resolution_val,'.png'))
pathName1_filter <- paste0(folder_filter,paste0('Cluster/ClusterUmap',resolution_val,'.png'))

pathName2_nofilter <- paste0(folder_nofilter,paste0('Cluster/HeatMap',resolution_val,'.png'))
pathName2_filter <- paste0(folder_filter,paste0('Cluster/HeatMap',resolution_val,'.png'))

p1 <- ggdraw() + draw_image(pathName1_nofilter, scale = 1)
p2 <- ggdraw() + draw_image(pathName1_filter, scale = 1)
print(plot_grid(p1, p2))

p1 <- ggdraw() + draw_image(pathName2_nofilter, scale = 1)
p2 <- ggdraw() + draw_image(pathName2_filter, scale = 1)
print(plot_grid(p1, p2))

```
